fields.summary: comment at the head of beeline -e

comments.body: I can take a look at this. Let me know [~muxin] if you were planning to work on this and I will re-assign it you.
sorry Vihang Karajgaonkar, I'm still not familiar with this.  I just attached a patch, please review it and inform me if there is anything inappropriate

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-11100
 is a issue we met before this one, patch it first would be better

Hi [~muxin] Thanks for the patch. Can you add some test cases as well? Once adding the patch you may want to click on submit patch button so that pre-commit tests run so that we can know if there are any regressions. Thanks!

thanx [~vihangk1], this issue occurs only when using -e option, and I noticed that test cases in hive project are all sqls, which will not reproduce this issue. Please let me know if there is a way to add shell test cases. the patch is already submitted.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12853949/HIVE-15820.patch
